name: Unchartered by AJ Fernandez - RobustoÂ
additionalNotes: Uncharted premium handmade cigars are yet another masterful creation from AJ Fernandez. Synonymous with quality in the Cuban-style tradition, everything AJ rolls turns to gold, and this top-quality line of maduro smokes brilliantly displays his unrivaled blending skills. Handcrafted in Nicaragua, Uncharted cigars feature a unique recipe of 75% Nicaraguan and 25% Jamastran filler tobaccos resting inside a thick and sturdy San Andres Mexican binder, and a rare dark-brown and luscious Ligero Habano Ecuador wrapper. Like all Fernandez creations, you can count on superb construction and steadfast consistency from one smoke to the next. The well-seasoned palate will savor a medium to full bodied cigar, rife with mouthwatering flavors of chocolate, spice,red pepper, sweet cedar, black coffee, and caramel.
